modalSavedSearch.deleteBodyTitle: Deleting your search removes it from your web and app experience.
modalSavedSearch.deleteBodySubTitle: Any email subscriptions and app notifications related to this search will also be removed.

empty.title: Get updates on your saved searches
empty.subTitle: Saving your searches saves you time and we will let you know whenever a match comes on the market.
empty.getAppSubscription: Our app opens up all sorts of possibilities, including self-touring any Zillow-owned home.
